mapper.insert: insert into brr_review (toiletNm, sessionId, sessionNickname, Profile, review, star, clean) values (#{toiletNm}, #{sessionId}, #{sessionNickname}, #{Profile}, #{review}, #{star}, #{clean})
mapper.select: select * from (select * from brr_review where toiletNm like #{toiletNm} order by inputdate desc) where rownum < 4
select count(*) from brr_review where toiletNm like '%' || #{_parameter} || '%'
select toiletNm, sessionId, sessionNickname, Profile, review, star, clean, to_char(inputdate, 'YYYY/MM/DD') inputdate from (select * from brr_review order by inputdate desc)
